text: During World War II, Operation Clawhammer was a planned British Commandos raid on a German radar and communication site near Cherbourg, France. It was cancelled in October, 1942. ==See also== * Operation Biting Category:Conflicts in 1942 Category:World War II British Commando raids Category:Cancelled military operations involving the United Kingdom Category:Cancelled military operations of World War II Category:Cancelled special forces operations
title: Operation Clawhammer
